author: Suzy Forman
title: 17 Low-Key Rich Mom Pieces for Winter Weather | Us Weekly
text: Us Weekly has affiliate partnerships. We receive compensation when you click on a link and make a purchase. [Learn more!](https://www.usmagazine.com/commerce-guidelines/) Please note, prices are accurate at the date of publication, January 12, 2024, but are subject to change. Being a mom is the hardest job in the world. If you need a day (or a week) to dress solely in sweats or pajamas, we say to go for it. But if you need a pick-me-up and a renewed boost of confidence, a chic outfit can make it happen in a snap. Let’s keep things easy by shopping online so your new clothes and accessories are delivered right to you. We’re aiming for the “rich mom” aesthetic — but low-key. Well-tailored, versatile basics, little flashes of designer and functional fashion — we’re even throwing some sophisticated loungewear in there! Everything we’ve picked out is under $100 and is 100% ready for winter weather. Shop below! 1. Affordable and Adorable! Nail the quiet luxury vibe without breaking the bank with this [BTFBM half-zip sweater](https://amzn.to/3S2l09u) — was $56, now $34! 2. You’ve Got Flare! Come with Us as we find all of lululemon’s best hidden gems in the We Made Too Much section. First up? These [Align High-Rise Mini-Flared Pants](https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&awinaffid=567357&campaign=&clickref=UsWeekly-sforman-In-text-COMMERCE-SHOPLowKeyRichMomWinter-DATE1-15-24&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fp%2Fwomens-leggings%2FAlign-HR-Mini-Flare-32-MD%2F_%2Fprod11460456%3Fcolor%3D52868&platform=pl) — originally $118, now $79! 3. Now That’s a Twist! Flattering and fashionable, this [Raisecom ribbed sweater dress](https://amzn.to/3O4v5lb) definitely calls for a mirror selfie — $44! 4. Falling for Fleece! This cozy, drop-shoulder [turtleneck sweatshirt](https://howl.me/clqAdrf737R) from Banana Republic Factory has an easy fit and a compliment-worthy look — was $75, now $38! 5. Faux Fur, Faux Sure! We love a puffer, but if you’re looking to impress at a meetup, make sure this [Bellivera fleece-lined trench](https://amzn.to/3Sj6snf) is in your arsenal — $80! 6. Thanks, It Has Pockets! Moms need to carry the world with them at all times, making this “pocket-plentiful” [Dagne Dover tote](https://fave.co/48OMnKO) a stylish must-have — was $155, now $89! 7. Love Leggings! Don’t want to give up your leggings? No problem. Simply switch to this leather-look [Tagoo pair](https://amzn.to/3S0QJaZ) — originally $60, now $40! 8. Best Booties! Shoes can seriously make or break a look. You can rely on these [Dream Pairs heeled booties](https://amzn.to/3TUejc6) to elevate all of your outfits — $36! 9. Cashmere Queen! Finding cashmere on major sale is our favorite hobby. You need to see this [Charter Club longline belted cardigan](https://howl.me/clqAreuk47g) from Macy’s — was $229, now $92! 10. Versatile Loungewear! Need loungewear you can wear outside? This [Lillusory set](https://amzn.to/423axiK), which comes in 12 colors, was made to be seen — $50! 11. Heavenly Hat! Adding a beanie to your look doesn’t have to make it super casual. Try out this amazingly soft [Barefoot Dreams beanie](https://amzn.to/42fGPap) — $37! 12. Dreamy Dress! You cannot skip over Lolë’s Winter Sale. This [half-zip dress](https://fave.co/48OHGAA) is a full 60% off right now — was $155, now $62! 13. Silky Satin! These cargo-inspired [Allegra K satin joggers](https://amzn.to/3U3sCLo) will take your street style (or playground style!) to the next level — $36! 14. Stunning Scarf! You’ll actually find yourself hoping for colder weather so you can rock this [Melifluos faux-fur scarf](https://amzn.to/426JaEj) from Spain — $17! 15. Velvety Soft! We can’t get over the color options of this [Express velvet blazer](https://www.jdoqocy.com/click-8841803-11553913?sid=LowKeyRichMomWinter-1-15-24&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.express.com%2Fclothing%2Fwomen%2Fvelvet-one-button-blazer%2Fpro%2F06747125%2Fcolor%2FWine%2F). A truly standout piece — $56! 16. Sophisticated Sweatshirt: Need to keep it comfy and casual, but don’t want to look lazy? Swap your crew neck for this [Dokotoo button-collar sweatshirt](https://amzn.to/3Uj8NA7) — was $50, now $39! 17. Last but Not Least! Big fan of jumpsuits? Same. This [Amazon Essentials pick](https://amzn.to/4b0vWwP) has especially captured our hearts — was $33, now $30!

author: T13
title: Reliquia del próximo santo millennial Carlo Acutis está en Chile
text: Carlo Acutis, un adolescente apasionado por internet y muy creyente conocido como el "ciberapóstol" o el "influencer de Dios", cuya muerte conmovió a Italia en 2006, [será canonizado después de que la Iglesia católica le atribuyera un segundo milagro](https://www.t13.cl/noticia/mundo/quien-carlo-acutis-santo-millenial-podria-canonizar-papa-23-5-2024), anunció el Vaticano. El Papa Francisco autorizó el pasado jueves 23 de mayo al Dicasterio para la Causa de los Santos, el departamento encargado de las beatificaciones y las canonizaciones, a "promulgar el milagro atribuido al beato Carlo Acutis", informó la Santa Sede. Carlo Acutis, muy aficionado de internet, con mucho talento informático y sobre todo imbuido por una fe precoz e intensa, creo páginas web religiosas y una exposición que documentaba los milagros eucarísticos. [ Lee También ](/noticia/nacional/el-tiempo/lunes-mayor-impacto-gianfranco-marcone-explica-como-llegara-chile-ciclon-31-5-2024) "El lunes sería el mayor impacto": Gianfranco Marcone explica cómo llegará a Chile el 'enorme' ciclón Si bien esta noticia de que Acutis se convertirá en el primer santo millennial se ha tomado los titulares de la prensa, un dato no menor de su vínculo con Chile ha dado de qué hablar. Y es que en nuestro país se encuentra la primera reliquia del futuro santo. Según detalló [Meganoticias](https://www.meganoticias.cl/nacional/448803-primera-reliquia-del-proximo-santo-carlo-acutis-esta-en-chile-como-visitarla-pdp-30-05-2024.html), el objeto está guardado en la Casa de Jóvenes Franciscanos, ubicada en la calle Chiloé, en Santiago. "Existen tres tipos de reliquias. La de primer, segundo y tercer grado. Esta es una reliquia de primer grado, es decir, corresponde a algo del cuerpo de Carlo Acutis. En este caso, es cabello", dijo al mencionado medio Luis Cisternas, hermano y sacerdote franciscano. Consultado por cómo consiguieron esta reliquia, Cisternas indicó que "para gestionarlo, tú tienes que tener el respaldo del obispo, del lugar o de tu superior. En este caso, nosotros tuvimos el respaldo de nuestro superior. El Provincial Franciscano de Chile. Y con él gestionamos la reliquia al Santuario della Spogliazione di Assisi, donde Carlo Acutis está sepultado". Y añadió: "Una reliquia no se puede enviar por encomienda. Entonces, hay que ir a retirarla, hay que ir a buscarla en persona. Y bueno, el provincial de ese momento, junto a otros frailes, la fueron a buscar y luego la trajeron". [ Lee También ](/noticia/politica/denuncian-candidata-alcaldesa-florida-entrego-vales-gas-municipales-campana-30-5-2024) Denuncian que candidata a alcaldesa de La Florida entregó vales de gas municipales en campaña ¿Cómo visitar la reliquia de Carlo Acutis? Según lo señalado por Luis Cisternas,la reliquia puede ser visitada en la Casa de Jóvenes Franciscanos San Felipe de Jesús, ubicada en calle Chiloé 1420, en la comuna de Santiago, Región Metropolitana. El horario disponible para visitar el lugar es de martes a sábado de 10:00 a 13:00 horas; y en la tarde, de 16:00 a 19:00 horas. [Síguenos en ](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEOgjh55R1O_OHSPw0T00iXYqFAgKIhDoI4eeUdTvzh0j8NE9NIl2)

author: Manuel Almario, Senior News Editor
title: UAE weather alert: Dust storms, rough seas, and rising temperatures expected today
text:
NCM warns of strong winds, blowing dust, and high humidity with mist formation
According to the NCM, the day will be partly cloudy with moderate to strong northwesterly winds, kicking up dust and sand, especially inland. Wind speeds are expected to range from 15 to 25 km/h, reaching up to 40 km/h in some areas. These conditions could reduce visibility on the roads and impact outdoor activities.
The highest temperature recorded in the country yesterday was a scorching 41.2°C in Kalba, Sharjah at 12:30pm. Today, temperatures in the internal regions are expected to peak between 35°C and 39°C. Coastal areas and islands can expect highs of 33°C to 37°C, while the mountains will see slightly cooler temperatures ranging from 31°C to 36°C.
Humidity will increase by night and into Friday morning, particularly in some internal areas, with a probability of mist forming — a reminder for early morning commuters to remain vigilant.
Meanwhile, the NCM has also issued a rough sea alert for the Oman Sea, with wave heights reaching up to 6 feet offshore. The Arabian Gulf is forecasted to be very rough in the morning, easing to moderate conditions by the afternoon. The alert remains in effect until 12 noon today, and beachgoers are urged to exercise caution.
Residents are advised to stay updated with the latest forecasts and heed safety advisories, especially those planning to travel by sea or engage in outdoor activities.

author: 大连日报
title: 时代中等职业技术学校与企业开展党建共建|党建_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
本报讯（迟乐杰 大连新闻传媒集团记者郑鸿）昨日，大连时代中等职业技术学校党支部与大连国际商会和展览有限公司联合党支部党建共建正式启动。双方将以“坚持平等自愿、坚持资源共享、坚持优势互补、坚持注重实效”为原则，探索党建引领下的产教融合新路径。
大连国际商会和展览有限公司长期致力于推动国际贸易与区域合作，是我市对外开放重要窗口之一。大连时代中等职业技术学校作为金普新区职业教育的中坚力量，近年来通过“无人机技能大赛”“劳模工匠进校园”等活动，为区域发展培养了大量的高素质技能人才。通过共建，双方将以标准化党支部建设为抓手，定期开展联合主题党日、党员培训等活动，共享党建资源；深化产教融合，实现信息、人才、场地等资源的共享与互补，形成可推广的经验；推进协同创新，实现职业教育与产业协同发展。未来，双方将以“匠心”守初心，以“融合”促发展，共同书写党建引领下的人才培育与产业升级新篇章。
